pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, April 11, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, April 11, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet Meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the House of Commons Foyer as of 12:00 p.m.

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at an event for the International Association of Fire Fighters.

Parliament Hill, Front Steps
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Accreditation from the Canadian Parliamentary Press Gallery required. For more information, contact Marc Fortier at Marc.fortier@parl.gc.ca

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.
